title: //h2[contains(@class, 'title')]
date: //div[contains(@class, 'submitted')]
body: //div[contains(@class, 'content-body')]

strip: //em[contains(text(), 'Listen to the latest ')]
strip: //img[@alt='Listen on Apple Podcasts']//parent::a//parent::p
